attributes.action: Increase the pay of all ranks of the armed forces significantly, and give them adequate compensation when injured on active service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to see our Armed Forces treated a lot better by this Government and this Country in general. We seem to show more emphasis on our sportsmen and women as heroes and pay them vast ammounts in wages, and yet our Servicemen and Women get pittance. I feel its time for this to stop, and we get our priorities right.
